recipe.title: Tiramisu Affogato
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups freshly brewed espresso (10 ounces) or 1 1/4 cups boiling water and 3 tablespoons instant-espresso powder
instructions: Beat cream with sugar until it just holds stiff peaks. Divide vanilla and coffee ice creams among glasses, then top with ladyfingers. Pour hot espresso on top and dollop with whipped cream. Grate chocolate on top.
